Ivan's Childhood

Rank: 623


During WWII- Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.


Director: Andrei Tarkovsky

Writer: Vladimir Bogomolov, Mikhail Papava, Andrei Tarkovsky

Stars: Nikolay Burlyaev, Valentin Zubkov, Evgeniy Zharikov

Tags: Coming,of,Age, Drama, War
